name: @thc/react-material-component
description: Implementation of Material Components Web for React

scripts.release: npm publish --access public && conventional-github-releaser -p angular && git push --follow-tags origin master
scripts.release-alpha: npm publish --tag alpha --access public && conventional-github-releaser -p angular && git push --follow-tags origin master
scripts.release-beta: npm publish --tag beta --access public && conventional-github-releaser -p angular && git push --follow-tags origin master

author: THC-Tools
